title: From B1 to Silver 5?
body:
This is probably a very stupid question, and i feel like it is, but i wanted to know. I'm new to ranked and i was just wondering, how come i went from B1 to S5? I won 3 of my 5 matched promos is this why? if not why do i automatically skip so many ranks?

Thanks in advanced :)

replies.body:
So the ranks go from 1-5 (1 being the best and 5 being the worst)
The ranking system waits for you to get to a 100 lp (league points) before you qualify for a series (a series is where your next few games decide whether you are going to advance up the ranks or stay) so if you are bronze 3 and have 100 lp,you will need to win 2/3 games to advance to bronze 2.However if you are bronze 1 and have a 100 lp,you will need to win 3/5 games to go up a rank(silver) and it goes on all the way to masters. Challenger updates every 24 hour unlike the rest of the ranks.(As far as I know)

The divisions go from:
Bronze 5
Bronze 4
Bronze 3
Bronze 2
Bronze 1 
Silver 5
Silver 4
and so on. You only went up 1 division for winning your promo matches
